body:
Hello everyone, I have see many amazing pvpers in the past month. They are not known, and fairly underrated. I created this post to give them some recognition!

Mine: Kiwi, very underrated PVPer, he can easily match  a known regular on the server pvp wise.

(Mods please don't lock this, I really want to help these players)
